description: Sample customer queries for testing the AI Customer Support Bot

faq_matching.description: Queries that should match existing FAQs with high confidence
queries: I forgot my password, how can I reset it?
Where is my order? I need to track it
I want my money back for this product
Are you available on Saturday?
What cards do you accept for payment?
How fast will my package arrive?
Can I change where my order is being shipped?
I need to cancel my monthly subscription
I want to return this item I bought
How do I change my credit card info?
Do you deliver to Canada?
How can I get in touch with support?
My product arrived broken, what should I do?
Can I stack multiple coupon codes?
How do I make an account on your site?
Is it safe to enter my credit card?
Where do I put my discount code?
My package hasn't arrived yet
Can I change my order? I just placed it
Do you do gift wrap?

conversational.description: Natural conversational queries that need contextual responses
queries: Hi, I need some help with my recent purchase
Hello, can you assist me?
I have a question about your service
Thanks for the help!
That was really helpful
I'm not sure I understand
Can you explain that in simpler terms?
What other options do I have?
Is there anything else I should know?
Perfect, that's exactly what I needed!

escalation.description: Queries that should trigger escalation to human support
queries: I need to speak to a manager
Transfer me to a human agent please
This bot is not helpful, get me a real person
I want to talk to someone on your team
Connect me with customer service representative
Escalate this issue to your supervisor
Can I speak with a live agent?
I need human assistance with this problem

low_confidence.description: Queries that should result in low confidence and ticket creation
queries: The website keeps crashing when I try to checkout
I was charged twice for the same order
My account is locked and I can't log in
There's a bug in your mobile app
I never received my refund from last month
Someone unauthorized accessed my account
The product I received is completely different from what I ordered
Your system keeps rejecting my valid credit card
I've been waiting for customer support for 3 hours
Why was my account suspended without explanation?

test_scenarios.name: Happy Path - FAQ Match
messages: How can I reset my password?
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: High confidence FAQ match, no ticket created

test_scenarios.name: Escalation Flow
messages: I need help with my order
The item I received is damaged
I want to speak to a manager

test_scenarios.name: Low Confidence Scenario
messages: Your website has a critical security vulnerability
I found a way to bypass authentication

test_scenarios.name: Multi-Turn Context
messages: I want to return an item
